name: Guess The Basketball Player QUIZ APP
name_original: Guess The Basketball Player QUIZ APP
description:
Guess The Basketball Player QUIZ APP

Test your basketball knowledge by this simple quiz.
Guess The Basketball Player is a simple quiz app that test your knowledge in knowing of your favorite basketball players.
• Earn coins: use for hints, reveal words and solve the problem.
• Earn Gems: to top the leader board.
